company.name: DhulBeeg Real Estate & Law
company.registration: Registered Real Estate Agency No. REA-0452

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide comprehensive property solutions with full legal protection, making real estate transactions secure, transparent, and stress-free for our clients in Hargeisa while contributing to Somaliland's economic development.
keyPoints: Integrated real estate and legal services

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the most trusted integrated real estate and legal service provider in Somaliland, setting new standards for excellence, transparency, and client satisfaction in Hargeisa's property market.

values.title: Integrity
values.content: We conduct all business with honesty, transparency, and ethical standards. Our word is our bond.

values.title: Excellence
values.content: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do, from client service to legal documentation.

values.title: Client-Centric
values.content: Our clients' success is our success. We listen, understand, and deliver solutions tailored to their needs.

values.title: Innovation
values.content: We embrace new technologies and methods to improve our services and client experience.

values.title: Community Focus
values.content: We are committed to the development of Hargeisa and Somaliland through responsible business practices.

history.description: DhulBeeg was founded by Jim'ale Abdirahman Madar and Eng Mahdi Mohumed Odowa with a vision to integrate legal services into real estate transactions.
Established in-house legal team to provide complete property transaction services.
Became Hargeisa's leading integrated real estate and legal service provider.
Implemented online property listings and digital documentation systems.
Expanded services to include property management and investment consulting.
Launched new website with property comparison tools and online consultations.

achievements.title: 750+ Happy Clients
achievements.description: Served clients from Somaliland and diaspora communities worldwide

achievements.title: 350+ Properties Sold
achievements.description: Successfully completed property transactions across all Hargeisa districts

achievements.title: 98% Success Rate
achievements.description: High success rate in property transactions and legal cases

achievements.title: 14+ Years Experience
achievements.description: Over a decade of experience in Hargeisa real estate market

achievements.title: 500+ Legal Cases
achievements.description: Successfully handled legal matters from documentation to dispute resolution

achievements.title: Zero Major Disputes
achievements.description: No major legal disputes in transactions handled by DhulBeeg
